column4: hi, would not having a swap partition cause lock ups when copying large files from one hdd to another?
depends on how big the memory is available on the one that hard locked
this machine is quadcore intel with 4gig cosair but when ever i try moving 6, 9, 12 gig files etc to the other sata drive after a bit it just freezes
generally no but I could be wrong, setup swap file and see
